name: 乱斗先锋
description:
This game was created by me alone, featuring a single player chess game featuring a tavern flag, a killing spire, and the Potato Brothers. Players need to constantly purchase followers, spells, and artifacts to strengthen their lineup, and then challenge new enemies
This game currently has 118 followers, 110 spells, and artifacts
The game has many unique gameplay features that are different from other self moving chess pieces
1、 Fighting takes more than one turn
Tavern Flag and Dota Go, as they are PvP, end with just one round of play. However, this new game has more than one round of combat as it is a solo game
Your chess pieces may all have residual health, and at this time, you can also pull the chess pieces from the standby area to fight
Two larger battlefields
The battlefield is divided into two rows and ten positions, and the enemy must attack the front row first before attacking the back row
The attack sequence is from left to right, from top to bottom, with priority given to attacking the enemy directly opposite
Use three spells and artifacts to strengthen your troops
After the battle, purchase followers, spells, and artifacts in the store. Spells can permanently strengthen your followers, while artifacts are passive and powerful effects that take effect
Lastly, there's a little bit of my complaint
The game is almost finished, but there is no psychological foundation at all. It is purely a personal creation, and it is difficult to find someone to test and listen to my thoughts
How can I make the game more fun? It's driving my brain crazy
I am only one person, so art, music, and so on can only rely on existing materials. I always cannot compare with big companies, and my energy is focused on gameplay
The current 200+followers, spells, and relics have been accumulated and produced one by one from the past to the present. It is really a huge and long process
I have also opened up to it now. It's okay if you don't make money, as long as someone likes it, just let it be a dream come true for yourself
In the future, if I join Steam, it will only cost 6 yuan. Although the quality is higher than the previous one and I should raise the price, I have no confidence in my psychology
I'm afraid that some people might say it's not fun, but what's even more frightening is that there's no one to provide feedback
Anyway, that's the situation
This game has a group, 733241134. Welcome to the group to provide valuable advice. Let's bitterly complain about this game
